text: [Music]
[Music]
hello
i'm ravi a cloud shopping engineer here
at the aws office in sydney
today i'll show you how to troubleshoot
the connectivity issues in aws transit
gateway
where there are transit gateway
attachments in amazon virtual private
cloud
let's get started after the customers
create a transit gateway
they create attachments to amazon ppc
ppn
aws direct connect gateway and aws
transactive pairing
they create the route table and then
associate the attachments
but sometimes they are unable to connect
to their ppc resources
using aws transient gateway and vice
versa
i've created a transit gateway and
attach two ppcs
ppca and ppcb to aws transit gateway
now for the routing between two ppcs
we'll configure route table
and associate it with two ppc
attachments
let me show you how as you can see
i'm already logged into the aws
management console
open ppc console choose the correct
reason
on the navigation pane choose transit
gateways
here you can see the transit gateway i
have already created
on the navigation pane choose transit
gateways
attachment here you can see our transit
gateway
attached to two ppcs ppca and ppcb
on the navigation pane choose transit
gateways
route tables here select default route
table which is already created
choose associations under associations
all the attachments are automatically
associated in the default route table
if it's a custom route table then we'll
need to associate the attachments
manually
choose propagations on the propagation
we can see the two ppc attachments are
propagated by default now choose
routes we see the routes that have been
learned from the
transit gateway attachments in case of
transit gateway attachments
to aws direct connect gateway and
dynamic vpn
if the routes show as black hole in the
transit gateway route table
then we might not be learning the routes
from the remote end
we'll need to investigate in aws data
connect gateway
and vpn the routes learned by aws
transit gateway
are not automatically propagated to the
transit gateway attachments
so we'll need to manually configure the
routes in ppc routable
with the target as nws transit gateway
now let's configure routing in ppc route
table
open the ppc console under the left
column select route tables
we can see there are two main route
tables for ppca and ppcb
let's select the route table for ppca
select route tabs and
choose edit routes choose add route and
provide the cidr of ppcb
and in target select the transit gateway
now choose save routes let's select the
route table for ppcb
select route tabs and choose edit routes
choose add routes and provide the cidr
of ppca
in target select the transit gateway
now choose save routes now
we will need to make sure that the
instance in ppca
uses the correct route table to reach
ppcb
and vice versa finally in instance in
ppca
we'll need to allow traffic coming from
ppcb and vice versa
let's check with routing on source
destination
amazon elastic compute cloud instance
open the amazon ec2 console select
instance in ppca
and check if it allows traffic from
remote instance in ppcb in its circuit
group and network sel
select instance in ppcb and check if it
allows traffic from remote instance in
ppca in your secondary group and network
acl
now check the route table of instance in
ppca
and vpcb and confirm it has a route to
remote network using aws transit gateway
now i'll show for instance a
so i'll go to the subnet and check the
route table
here you can see there's a route for
remote network pointing to transit
gateway
now i'll do the same for instance b here
you can see
ppcb sidear pointing to transit gateway
now in the ppc console select the
network sel
find the network interface of the
transit gateway in ppca
and check the subnet id in bbc console
under network sl
check it if it allows remote traffic
ppcb sider
in inbound rules and outbound rules
we need to do the same for elastic
network interface
of the transit gateway in bpcb now i'll
go to ec2 console
select network interface and elastic
network interface
check for subnet nacl there is no
security group for aws transient gateway
network interface
it should allow target iv range in
egress rule and source cr in english
rule
thanks for watching and happy cloud
computing from all of us here at aws
